title: The above quantities of water shall be exclusively for firefighting and shall not be utilised for domestic/or other use
clause_text: The above quantities of water shall be exclusively for firefighting and shall not be utilised for domestic/or other use. The layout of underground static water tank shall be as per the requirement of CFO/CFO manual.
